# Migration Assessment Template

**Version:** 20.0

Use this template to assess an existing project for migration into the ProductFactoryFramework.

## Recommended Approach

### Migration Strategy

- [ ] **Big Bang:** Migrate everything at once
- [ ] **Incremental:** Migrate feature by feature
- [ ] **Parallel:** Run old and new simultaneously
